skos:Concept.skos:definition: A term used to indicate that the execution of a Digital Service has been cancelled.

skos:ConceptScheme.rdfs:label: Digital Service Execution Status Thesaurus
skos:ConceptScheme.dcterms:description: This thesaurus defines a controlled vocabulary for representing the status of execution of Digital Services. This allows for standardized representation and understanding of execution status in various systems.
skos:ConceptScheme.dcterms:title: The OKP4 Execution Status Thesaurus

skos:Concept.skos:definition: A term used to indicate that the execution of a Digital Service has been completed and the service has been delivered to the user.
A term used to indicate that the execution of a Digital Service has failed.
A term used to indicate that the execution of a Digital Service is currently in progress.
